Krakatau Java Assembler Maven Plugin
Last Published: 01 Oct 2013  | Version: 1.0
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Github project

krakatau:assemble

Full name:

com.alexkasko.krakatau:krakatau-maven-plugin:1.0:assemble

Description:

Assembles Java ASM (.j) files into class files using Krakatau python library

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
asmFileOrDirs File[] - List of ASM (.j) files (or directories)
User property is: asmFileOrDirs.
outputDir File - Output directory
User property is: outputDir.

Parameter Details

asmFileOrDirs:

List of ASM (.j) files (or directories)
  • Type: java.io.File[]
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: asmFileOrDirs

outputDir:

Output directory
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: outputDir
